title: 105_s763
content: Safe Schools Act of 1997 - Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 (ESEA) to require a local educational agency that receives ESEA funds to expel a student determined to be in possession of an illegal drug, or illegal drug paraphernalia on school property. Renames the Gun-Free Schools Act of 1994 as the Safe Schools Act of 1997.
